        public org.apache.http.client.methods.CloseableHttpResponse executeWith(org.apache.http.impl.client.CloseableHttpClient client)
        Executes underlying request with given |client|. If first HTTP call returns 401 status code, it tries to refresh access token. (Given client is not closed)
